          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az iszlám vallás</string>
            <string language="en">The Islam religion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Islamreligion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La religion de l'Islam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A religião do islam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La religione di Islam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η θρησκεία Ισλάμ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La religión del Islam</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az iszlám vallás kialakulása</string>
            <string language="en">the rise of the Islam religion</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Mohamed,  muszlim,  hódítás,  </string>
            <string language="en">Mohammed, muslim, conquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">der Anstieg der Islamreligion</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'élévation de la religion de l'Islam</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a ascensão da religião do islam</string>
          </description>

          </description>
          <description>

          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mohamed, Moslem, Eroberung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mohamed, musulman, conquête</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mohammed, muçulmano, conquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
